text: Lametilidae is a family of bivalves. The family is related to the nut clams (Nuculidae). ==Taxonomy== * Lametila ** Lametila abyssorum * Phaseolus Monterosato 1875 ** Phaseolus ovatus * Prelametila ** Prelametila clarkei Allen & Sanders, 1973 ==References== Category:Bivalve families
title: Lametilidae
